sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.CODE AS "comboValue", a.CODE_NM AS "comboText" FROM SYS_CODE a WHERE (0=0) AND a.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND a.CODE = #code#
#searchNotIn[]#
AND level = #level#
AND a.PARENT_CODE = #parentCode# ORDER BY a.CODE_ODR, a.CODE
AND level = #level#
CONNECT BY PRIOR CODE = PARENT_CODE START WITH PARENT_CODE = #startParentCode# ORDER SIBLINGS BY CODE, CODE_ODR

SELECT a.PARENT_CODE AS "parentCode", a.CODE AS "code", a.CODE_NM AS "codeNm", a.ADD_COL1 AS "addCol1", a.ADD_COL2 AS "addCol2", a.ADD_COL3 AS "addCol3", a.ADD_COL4 AS "addCol4", a.ADD_COL5 AS "addCol5", a.USE_YN AS "useYn" FROM SYS_CODE a WHERE (0=0) AND a.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND a.CODE_NM like '%'||#searchNm#||'%'
AND a.CODE = #code#
AND a.ADD_COL1 = #addCol01#
AND a.ADD_COL2 = #addCol02#
AND a.ADD_COL3 = #addCol03#
AND a.ADD_COL4 = #addCol04#
AND a.ADD_COL5 = #addCol05#
#searchNotIn[]#
AND a.PARENT_CODE = #parentCode# ORDER BY a.CODE_ODR, a.CODE
AND level = #level#
CONNECT BY PRIOR CODE = PARENT_CODE START WITH PARENT_CODE = #startParentCode# ORDER SIBLINGS BY CODE, CODE_ODR

SELECT a.PARENT_CITYAUTH_CD AS "parentCode", a.CITYAUTH_CD AS "code", a.CITYAUTH_NM AS "codeNm" FROM TB_CITYAUTH a WHERE a.PARENT_CITYAUTH_CD = #parentCode# ORDER BY a.CODE_ODR, a.PARENT_CITYAUTH_CD, a.CITYAUTH_CD

SELECT aa.* FROM ( SELECT
LEVEL AS "lvl",
a.EVALU_INDICAT_CD AS "code", a.UPPER_EVALU_INDICAT_CD AS "parentCode", a.EVALU_INDICAT_NM AS "codeNm", (SELECT EVALU_INDICAT_NM FROM TB_EVALU_INDICAT b WHERE A.UPPER_EVALU_INDICAT_CD = b.EVALU_INDICAT_CD) AS "parentCodeNm", a.CODE_ORD AS "codeOrd", a.EVALU_TYPE AS "evaluType", a.EVALU_INDICAT_USE_YN AS "useYn" FROM TB_EVALU_INDICAT a WHERE (0=0) AND a.EVALU_INDICAT_USE_YN = 'Y'
AND a.EVALU_INDICAT_CD like '%'||#searchNm#||'%'
AND a.EVALU_INDICAT_CD = #code#
#searchNotIn[]#
AND a.UPPER_EVALU_INDICAT_CD = #parentCode# ORDER BY a.CODE_ORD
AND LEVEL != 4
AND level = #level#
CONNECT BY PRIOR EVALU_INDICAT_CD = UPPER_EVALU_INDICAT_CD START WITH EVALU_INDICAT_CD = #startParentCode#
OR EVALU_INDICAT_CD = 'EVALU_FINL' OR EVALU_INDICAT_CD = 'EVALU_INPT'
ORDER SIBLINGS BY CODE_ORD
) aa

SELECT ROWNUM as "rn", EVALU_INDICAT_CD as "code", UPPER_EVALU_INDICAT_CD as "parentCode", EVALU_INDICAT_NM as "codeNm", EVALU_TYPE as "codeType", EVALU_BUSI_NO as "evaluBusiNo", EVALU_STAGE as "evaluStage", NVL2(NEXT_EVALU_CODE, NEXT_EVALU_CODE, 'AS30') as "nextEvaluCode" FROM ( SELECT A.EVALU_INDICAT_CD, A.UPPER_EVALU_INDICAT_CD, A.EVALU_INDICAT_NM, A.EVALU_TYPE, B.EVALU_BUSI_NO, B.EVALU_STAGE, LEAD(A.EVALU_INDICAT_CD) OVER (ORDER BY ROWNUM) as "NEXT_EVALU_CODE" FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_EVALU_INDICAT WHERE 1 = 1
AND LEVEL != 4
AND LEVEL = #level#
START WITH EVALU_INDICAT_CD = #evaluStage# CONNECT BY PRIOR EVALU_INDICAT_CD = UPPER_EVALU_INDICAT_CD )A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM TB_EVALU_DESTI_BUSI_INDICAT WHERE EVALU_BUSI_NO = #evaluBusiNo# AND EVALU_STAGE = #evaluStage# )B ON A.EVALU_INDICAT_CD = B.EVALU_INDICAT_CD WHERE EVALU_STAGE IS NOT NULL ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND UPPER_EVALU_INDICAT_CD = #upperEvaluDetailCode# AND ROWNUM = 1
AND EVALU_INDICAT_CD = #evaluDetailCode#

SELECT AA.*, (SELECT UPPER_EVALU_INDICAT_CD FROM TB_EVALU_INDICAT b WHERE AA."parentCode" = b.EVALU_INDICAT_CD) AS "grandCode", (SELECT EVALU_INDICAT_NM FROM TB_EVALU_INDICAT WHERE EVALU_INDICAT_CD = (SELECT UPPER_EVALU_INDICAT_CD FROM TB_EVALU_INDICAT b WHERE AA."parentCode" = b.EVALU_INDICAT_CD)) AS "grandCodeNm" FROM ( SELECT A.EVALU_INDICAT_CD AS "code", A.UPPER_EVALU_INDICAT_CD AS "parentCode", A.EVALU_INDICAT_NM AS "codeNm", (SELECT EVALU_INDICAT_NM FROM TB_EVALU_INDICAT b WHERE A.UPPER_EVALU_INDICAT_CD = b.EVALU_INDICAT_CD) AS "parentCodeNm", A.CODE_ORD AS "codeOrd", A.EVALU_TYPE AS "evaluType", A.EVALU_INDICAT_USE_YN AS "useYn" FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_EVALU_INDICAT WHERE 1 = 1
AND LEVEL != 3
AND LEVEL = #level#
START WITH EVALU_INDICAT_CD = #parentCode# CONNECT BY PRIOR EVALU_INDICAT_CD = UPPER_EVALU_INDICAT_CD )A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM TB_EVALU_DESTI_BUSI_INDICAT WHERE EVALU_BUSI_NO = #evaluBusiNo# AND EVALU_STAGE = #evaluStage# )B ON A.EVALU_INDICAT_CD = B.EVALU_INDICAT_CD WHERE EVALU_STAGE IS NOT NULL ) AA WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT EVALU_ITEM_CD AS "evaluItemCd" ,GROUP_CD AS "groupCd" ,(SELECT EVALU_INDICAT_NM FROM TB_EVALU_INDICAT B WHERE B.EVALU_INDICAT_CD = A.GROUP_CD) AS "groupCdNm" ,EVALU_ITEM_NM AS "evaluItemNm" ,COLSPAN_SIZE AS "colspanSize" FROM TB_EVALU_ITEM_SPAN A WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND GROUP_CD = #code# ORDER BY CODE_ORD
SELECT EVALU_BUSI_NO ,EVALU_STAGE ,EVALU_INDICAT_CD FROM TB_EVALU_DESTI_BUSI_INDICAT WHERE EVALU_BUSI_NO = #evaluBusiNo# AND EVALU_STAGE = #evaluStage#
SELECT EVALU_BUSI_NO ,EVALU_STAGE ,EVALU_INDICAT_CD FROM TB_EVALU_DESTI_BUSI_INDICAT WHERE EVALU_BUSI_NO = #evaluBusiNo# AND EVALU_STAGE = #evaluStage#
SELECT EVALU_BUSI_NO ,EVALU_STAGE ,EVALU_INDICAT_CD FROM TB_EVALU_DESTI_BUSI_INDICAT WHERE EVALU_BUSI_NO = #evaluBusiNo# AND EVALU_STAGE = #evaluStage#

SELECT FILE_NO ,ROOT_NO ,DOCU_TYPE ,FILE_ORG_NM ,FILE_SVR_NM ,FILE_PATH ,FILE_SIZE FROM ( SELECT FILE_NO ,ROOT_NO ,DOCU_TYPE ,FILE_ORG_NM ,FILE_SVR_NM ,FILE_PATH ,FILE_SIZE FROM TB_ATTHFILE WHERE ROOT_NO = #evaluBusiNo# AND DOCU_TYPE = #evaluId# ORDER BY FILE_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT EVALU_FND_SEQ ,EVALU_INDICAT_CD ,EVALU_BUSI_NO ,EVALU_STAGE ,USER_ID ,EVALU_FND_VALUE FROM TB_EVALU_FND WHERE EVALU_INDICAT_CD = 'CT310' AND EVALU_BUSI_NO = #evaluBusiNo# AND USER_ID = #evaluId#

SELECT EVALU_FND_SEQ ,EVALU_INDICAT_CD ,EVALU_BUSI_NO ,EVALU_STAGE ,USER_ID ,EVALU_FND_VALUE FROM TB_EVALU_FND WHERE EVALU_INDICAT_CD = 'CT210' AND EVALU_BUSI_NO = #evaluBusiNo# AND USER_ID = #evaluId#

SELECT EVALU_FND_SEQ ,EVALU_INDICAT_CD ,EVALU_BUSI_NO ,EVALU_STAGE ,USER_ID ,EVALU_FND_VALUE FROM TB_EVALU_FND WHERE EVALU_INDICAT_CD = 'CT220' AND EVALU_BUSI_NO = #evaluBusiNo# AND USER_ID = #evaluId#

SELECT EVALU_FND_SEQ ,EVALU_INDICAT_CD ,EVALU_BUSI_NO ,EVALU_STAGE ,USER_ID ,EVALU_FND_VALUE FROM TB_EVALU_FND WHERE EVALU_INDICAT_CD = 'CT230' AND EVALU_BUSI_NO = #evaluBusiNo# AND USER_ID = #evaluId#

SELECT EVALU_FND_SEQ ,EVALU_INDICAT_CD ,EVALU_BUSI_NO ,EVALU_STAGE ,USER_ID ,EVALU_FND_VALUE FROM TB_EVALU_FND WHERE EVALU_INDICAT_CD = 'CT110' AND EVALU_BUSI_NO = #evaluBusiNo# AND USER_ID = #evaluId#

SELECT EVALU_FND_SEQ ,EVALU_INDICAT_CD ,EVALU_BUSI_NO ,EVALU_STAGE ,USER_ID ,EVALU_FND_VALUE FROM TB_EVALU_FND WHERE EVALU_INDICAT_CD = 'PR310' AND EVALU_BUSI_NO = #evaluBusiNo# AND USER_ID = #evaluId#

SELECT EVALU_FND_SEQ ,EVALU_INDICAT_CD ,EVALU_BUSI_NO ,EVALU_STAGE ,USER_ID ,EVALU_FND_VALUE FROM TB_EVALU_FND WHERE EVALU_INDICAT_CD = 'PR220' AND EVALU_BUSI_NO = #evaluBusiNo# AND USER_ID = #evaluId#

SELECT EVALU_FND_SEQ ,EVALU_INDICAT_CD ,EVALU_BUSI_NO ,EVALU_STAGE ,USER_ID ,EVALU_FND_VALUE FROM TB_EVALU_FND WHERE EVALU_INDICAT_CD = 'PR210' AND EVALU_BUSI_NO = #evaluBusiNo# AND USER_ID = #evaluId#

SELECT FILE_NO ,ROOT_NO ,DOCU_TYPE ,FILE_ORG_NM ,FILE_SVR_NM ,FILE_PATH ,FILE_SIZE FROM ( SELECT FILE_NO ,ROOT_NO ,DOCU_TYPE ,FILE_ORG_NM ,FILE_SVR_NM ,FILE_PATH ,FILE_SIZE FROM TB_ATTHFILE WHERE ROOT_NO = #evaluBusiNo# AND DOCU_TYPE = #evaluId# ORDER BY FILE_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT EVALU_FND_SEQ ,EVALU_INDICAT_CD ,EVALU_BUSI_NO ,EVALU_STAGE ,USER_ID ,EVALU_FND_VALUE FROM TB_EVALU_FND WHERE EVALU_INDICAT_CD = #EVALU_INDICAT_CD# AND EVALU_BUSI_NO = #evaluBusiNo# AND USER_ID = #evaluId#

SELECT FILE_NO ,ROOT_NO ,DOCU_TYPE ,FILE_ORG_NM ,FILE_SVR_NM ,FILE_PATH ,FILE_SIZE FROM ( SELECT FILE_NO ,ROOT_NO ,DOCU_TYPE ,FILE_ORG_NM ,FILE_SVR_NM ,FILE_PATH ,FILE_SIZE FROM TB_ATTHFILE WHERE ROOT_NO = #evaluBusiNo# AND DOCU_TYPE = #evaluId# ORDER BY FILE_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT EVALU_FND_SEQ ,EVALU_INDICAT_CD ,EVALU_BUSI_NO ,EVALU_STAGE ,USER_ID ,EVALU_FND_VALUE FROM TB_EVALU_FND_PREV WHERE EVALU_INDICAT_CD = #EVALU_INDICAT_CD# AND EVALU_BUSI_NO = #evaluBusiNo# AND USER_ID = #evaluId#

SELECT SUBSTR(BJD_CODE, 0, 2) as "parentCode"
, SUBSTR(BJD_CODE, 0, 2) as "code" , SD as "codeNm"
, SUBSTR(BJD_CODE, 3, 3) as "code" , SGG as "codeNm"
FROM TREDSUSER.TB_BJD_CODE WHERE (1=1) AND BJD_CODE LIKE '__00000000'
AND SGG IS NOT NULL AND BJD_CODE LIKE '_____00000'
AND BJD_CODE LIKE #parentCode#||'%'
